metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0800 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in tiffcrop intools/tiffcrop.c:3502, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service viaa crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fixis available with commit 33aee127.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0800` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.4
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.4
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.4
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-6ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-6ubuntu0.4').
